extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of third year standing or above

basic.description:
The sources of High Renaissance art will be examined and special attention will be given to the works of Leonardo, Raphael and Michelangelo, up to about 1520.
RECOMMENDATION    ARTH 214/3.0 and 215/3.0 (or ARTH 213/6.0).
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Italian Art of the High Renaissance
